title: Paparazzi Visor for Face Sun Protection (Shiny Transparent Plastic) - Adjustable Angle, One Size Fits Most (Mercury Silver with Black Band)
features: ♥ POLARIZED REFLECTIVE FACE VISOR - Solar face shield provides privacy while blocking out sun rays to protect your full face from tanning induced aging and skin damage. Face will be hidden behind a spectrum of reflected colors (similar to "one way mirrors") while you have a tinted view from the inside similar to wearing sunglasses. Asian Korean visor style seen worn by celebrities like V Stiviano.

♥ ADJUSTABLE ANGLE & ONE-SIZE-FITS-MOST - Wear the visor comfortably while outdoors at festivals, hiking, or lounging at the beach. Conveniently adjusts to your preferred angle to block sunlight or expand line of vision.

♥ TINTED, TRANSPARENT COVERING - Continues to protect your face without blocking your view. Tinted screen allows you to see without squinting, even in sunny weather. It's like a pair of sunglasses that covers as much of your face as you desire!
✔ Dimensions: 7" length, 12" width, 4.5" height from base.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - If the visor does not meet your expectations (defects, style, etc), we will gladly exchange it or provide you a full refund! Warning: Visor WILL WARP if kept in extremely hot spaces for extended periods. Visor will arrive with protective film to prevent scratches.
description: ✔ Perfect for any outdoor occasion from music festivals to sailing and gardening. Offers face protection from sun when tanning or while driving in convertibles or with sunroof open. ✔ Reflective coating on the tinted cover makes sure you have privacy. Only you will be able to see out of the visor. Outside viewers cannot see beneath the visor. ✔ Our Visor Style makes it perfect for sun protection while providing proper ventilation to your hair and head. No more oily hair or hat-flattened hair! Heat rises up and the visor style permits the heat to completely dissipate away from you.
♥ Every purchase backed by our Satisfaction Guarantee! Simply love the visor or we will gladly provide you a full refund or exchange.
